content: opposite side now onto the foot and toe - the worst is over foot you now have 56 64 72 stitches for each sock 28 32 36 for each half the beginning of the round is at the bottom of sock a you will now continue in the following pattern round 1- knit across the first 28 32 36 stitches of sock a repeat for sock b turn your needles knit across the next 28 32 36 stitches of sock b i n pattern repeat for sock a round 2- k all stitches repeat rounds 1 and 2 until the sock comfortably covers your pinky toe toe if switching to a contrast colour for the toe switch to your second colour now and complete a row of all k stitches and then proceed to round 1 otherwise go right to round 1 © 2020 amy van well designs all rights reserved it is illegal to sell the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically round 1 - ssk k to 2nd last stitch k2tog * repeat * for the top and bottom of each sock round 2 - k all stitches repeat round 1 and 2 five times for a total of 10 row then repeat round 1 until there are eight stitches remaining on each sock join the stitches with kitchener stitch finishing weave in all ends enjoy your socks © 2020 amy van well designs all rights reserved it is illegal to sell the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically
